review: I should have stick to their bak kut teh instead. However, thinking i try something different, i ordered their laksa. Really stingy, only half a egg and a few taopok. They don't even bean sprouts or fish cake. geez.

topic: Nice Restaurant For A Decent Meal
review: Don‚Äôt be misled with the name of the restaurant as it serves lots of local dishes besides bak kut teh.Their signature dishes are bak kut teh with mee sua and bak kut teh yong tau foo.The meats are tender and yummy. However some of us found the soup too peppery and spicy. The Laksa was very authentic and delicious. Food and drink prices are very reasonable and food portions relatively big. Good value for the money spent

topic: You won‚Äôt go over the moon even if you‚Äôre spoon-fed by Mr. Koon
review: Too many items on the menu come at a price: the bak kut teh just isn‚Äôt very good. The so-called chicken rice which costs $1 per bowl has no flavour of chicken. No free water. Wonder if many customers come here to play e-dart.

I don't know much about how bak kut teh should taste like, but we compare this to Legendary Bak Kut Teh and Koon is the winner in our oppinion. Tender and tasty ribs. And the other dishes were to really great. Both in presentation and service.
Happy hour Tiger beer was extra bonus.
I would have returned to this place to try their premium bak kut teh as well if we had more time, as their standard was more than just good!
Clean and air conditioned . Service is quick and friendly. Food is delicious , piping hot and value for money . Quite a variety on menu besides pork rib soup !
The food is moderately okay. The soup is a little too oily. The saving grace is the generous and tender meat served. It‚Äôs a bistro, so expect music and sounds from the dart machine.

The service was ok if you can ignore the sniffing. The lunch was not spectacular and despite and old newspaper review, we expected better. Clearly a family run business which appears to have seen better imes. Maybe it is a generational change. We visited after a walk through the reserve.
Excellent service. They are ready to serve us. Food was nice and affordable. A nice place to visit again
Good food, come here frequently. Fast and efficient service. The waiter and waitresses here are friendly

topic: One of the must come places in Singapore
review:
This is a real east meet west venue. Beer is @ Sin$15 for two glasses during happy hours, and you can have chicken feet or chicken wings to wash it down. The famous Bah Kut Teh ( traditional herbal pork rib soup) plus other local food cooked at a high standard are at your disposal.
The service is immaculate, and all the service staff speak good English.
Ambience is unique, and the background music is soft and well chosen.
Highly recommended for a easy evening out with good food, good beer and value for money.

Food was great, I would rate the bak kut teh as the best here. I came with friends and tried out few different dishes. But the Bak Kut Teh was the most outstanding one out of all. The pork knuckle is another dish that I recommend. The meat is tender and soft and well seasoned. Overall great experience at Koon Bak Kut Teh
Drinks came promptly. White seafood noodle with salted egg yolk came piping hot and tasted satisfying. 2 large prAwns, many clams. Will be back to try the bak kut the which many were having
Yummy food! Good soup base not too peppery. Generous free flow of soup. We had salted vegetable, beancurd skin n braised pork. All good!

Delicious BKT and side dishes with friendly & efficient service! Recommend the bean curd skin and braised meat. Soup is tasty and peppery not the herbal kind. Pricing quite reasonable but parking can be challenging. Will be back again
The food here was nice. Sibei good. Nearby my house too. The food here was quite cheap too. Totally worth it.

Food was pretty good. We had the standard bak kut teh which was fragrant and tender. The pork trotters we had was quite delightful. However, comparing the amount and the price, i feel that part could be improved as it wasnt really enough for us to be full
Tried the bah kut teh.. Nice.. Will be back soon.. The white beehoon.. hmmm.. U see the photo lo Service wise can be slightly better..
Good food.. good coloring.. service good everything good good good so good very good.... totally enjoy my visit
The environment is nice and food is good. Will recommend their Bak kit Tek as its peppery and meat is soft
Great atmosphere with nice food The price is too expensiveb ut nevermind because it is okay as i am damn hungry and i apologise for dabaoing prata to ur shop lol
Its nice. Smart marketing reviews. Not sure of the outcome yet though i think its nice. The smell of the bak ku teh is nice
The overall place is not bad . Music is nice and place is also clean. Of course the service is good too !üòÉ
food is good and service is friendly. we ordered bak ku teh set lunch and singapore braised pork rice and it taste quite nice
Very cosy and friendly stuff. Food is very appealing. The time taken to prepare the food is fast. Overall a good experience.
Affordable and free ice lemon tea. There's air con and music too. Ordered the basic bak kut teh and it was good with refill of soup
One of the few places with air con at this place. You also get free drink. With a review. The white beehoon is also quite nice.
Good aircon. Friendly staff to remind you to give rating on tripadvisor. Fantastic old school chinese music.
Third time visiting, love the white been hoon! Air conditioner is powerful and the music is pleasant to listen to too. Good job
The braised pork trotter was amazing and they even de-bone it for you.. Highly recommend you to come and have a meal and enjoy the amenities @ KoonBakKutTeh Keep up the good food...
Very delicious braised meat rice for a great price! Only a block away from our hotel and open until 3am!
First time been here, the environment is nice and the food also very nice, especially the superior bee hoon. Must try next time

topic: Nice place to try local food
review: Comfort food at food court prices! Friendly service and good location with easy parking. The laksa is packed with flavours and try the Salted Egg White Bee Hoon too!
First time at this restaurant which has a wide variety of local food. Lively ambiance with electronic dart boards!
Great service and ambience, food looks and taste good, reasonable price. Spent a great lunch here today !
Very nice food and affordable price. Have a good time with friends here. Nice atmosphere. Hope to come again next time.
Second visit and they serve Good food. The pork is very tender. Comfortable place for lunch. I like it

Ordered white seafood bee hoon n Kong Bak (Braised Chinese Pork). Bee Hoon was ok but as the braised pork was cut into small pieces for cooking, it dries up the meat but the fat is melting in your mouth though. So I would give it a mixed 4 star. Surprisingly ice lemon tea was prepared and made in the shop!
White bee hoon in tasty broth. Bak ku teh is nice especially on a cold night. Service is good too. They also serve normal double boiled soup for those, especially kids who can't take spice or pepper.
Clean, nice, great place to eat and chill with friends. Have not been here a lot, but first experience is prerty decent.
Good food with affordable prices and good atmosphere. Nice place for relaxing. Would come back here again!
Great dinner at koon. Good food and service. Tasty bak kut Teh and chicken feet‚Äôs. Tau Poh is great too. Love it.
Best bkt I've tried so far! This food can be found at every corner but thabkful to have chance upon this place. Highly recommended
Very nice place . Tomyam is nice and i like the soup. I will come again and visit. I love ice cocktail jelly
Good environment and food in this premises. Provide free drink and good service attitude from all the staff.
Good food good atmosphere, would definitely come back for more. Great staff and amazing service, food received very fast
Very accessible and near the office. Less people so i felt very comfortable. Food choices are plenty. Will give it another try next time
The atmosphere is nice, very good place to hang around. There is food and alcohol and darts to play too.
Good food with good price.. accessible with a lot of bus.. have a few dartboard for playing darts as well.
Good food good ambience would definitely come back here for more and definitely try their bak kut teh
Back kut teh here is delicious! My family has been coming back for more every week! :) The service is excellent.
If you're looking for a place that opens to a late time and you're stranded in the L of vander, come the hell here! It's just 50 steps away from a bus stop, so you don't have to wander too much
very good nice noodles ,best in Singapore.Will come every week ,nice beer, staff is friendly. Good location and promotion is great. Nice beer and promotion is best.
Bak Kut Teh many choices and tasty. Staff member are friendly. Near to Bendemeer MRT. Soup is refillable. White Bee Hoon is worth order also.
The food was delicious and the server was very kind and polite. The white pepper soup refill is a plus. Strongly recommended.
Tried this place as i thought the standard of our favourite Founders BKT was dropping. I would pay more for a solid bowl of BKT
Their luncheon meat fries, Bak ku teh and ice lemon tea are so good! Definitely worth a tryüëçüèª üëçüèªüëçüèª
Braised meat rice is quite nice.. Hope can get more menu here..will visit again on next time. Atmosphere not bad.
First time trying, hope the bak ku teh is niceüëçüëçüëç. The seafood mee Hoon should be nice too. Served very hot and meat is nice as well! Would come back here again!
The food is awesome. Music is great . Highly recommend. Should try when coming to Singapore . Hurrayyy
Near bendeemer mrt, soup is refillable. White bee hoon is delicious. Staff is friendly. . . . . . . .
Outlet with tasty food! Nearby an mrt when you get other necessities. Often head there coz you can play darts too.
Really nice soup üëçthe price is reasonable. Food is warm. Place is nice. Waiter and waitress is nice. :)
Awesome lu rou fan and tasty soup. Highly recommended. Suitable for friends n family. Darts machine available s well
Great for a rainy day. Comfort food üòçüê∑ Was here with a group of friends and we all ordered different dishes.
Yummy yummy Lu Rou Fan. I come here to get my fix of it üòä the laksa, bakuteh, everything looks good. Consistent yummies

topic: So much to eat, so little time
review: Every time I eat here, I end up eating something I didn‚Äôt plan at first to. And it‚Äôs usually delicious. Try the White Bee Hoon with salted egg.
Overall it's good, except for the 'salted vegetable' being overly salty ‚ò∫Ô∏è Nice Tripe bah kut teh (pepper), accompanying chillies is awesome!
A must try! Convenient for parking my car. Taste good and bak kut teh have unlimited soup. Spacious space!
Convenient as very near the office. Good serving for the price. Not so crowded during lunch time. Good for groups. Will try again!
Nice place.. Aircon and out door seating available.. Affordable price.. Great for families to enjoy their dinner, Darts available too...

topic: Lunch with Lotus Soup n Belly Pork
review: Good yummy meal with melt in the mouth belly pork and sweet Lotus Root soup..! Many delicious local dishes all under one roof and traditional dishes not found elsewhere in Singapore...
Good! Food for lunch. Air-conditioned and very nice surrounding Clean and quick serve. Can play dart board games .
The food here is not too bad, above expectation. The place is clean and staff are friendly. Parking is available.
good! very nice for friends gathering! the soup base is spicy enough the meat is tender. the staff here are good and friendly! will definitely come back again

Good location with aircon and music, came here a few times with friends and colleagues. Customer service is great and friendly, will help to refill the soup for you. The soup is very flavourful with the spices, meat is rather tender. Overall is good, will recommend to friends try‚ò∫Ô∏è
the bakut teh is spicy and awesome for those who prefers such taste. It is a worthwhile trip to this restaurant. I will definitely try again next time.
The Singapore Laksa is better than Katong Laksa. Must try! Is just 5 minutes from Marina Bay Sands casino easily located along Lavendar road towards Balestier. Yes is on Hamilton Road.
Chanced upon this place, found the Bak Kut Teh here to be excellent and well-priced. Good location to relax and chill as well. Recommended!
Great lunch on Sat noon . Big portion and reasonable price . Taste good . Friendly waitress and good environment . Playing nice Chinese Musics .
Nice food, moderating ambient, staff are helpful and accommodative to customer‚Äôs request. Food served are systematic and swift. Recommend for good lunch out.
Aircon cooling place and the soup is pretty tasty. Quiet environment. Although e electronic dart is quite noisy.
Tried Bak Kut Teh, you tiao, peanut, luncheon meat n they are are good especially the luncheon meat Can try them out urselves. It is air-conditioned n cosy environment. Trying out laska now
Come here with colleagues as we work close by, food is not bad. Always tend to order the bak kut teh, if you love pepper flavored soups, this is the place you want to try.
Really good Bak Kut Teh around this area. Nice place to hand out with colleagues and friends have lunch here.
Very goooooood, came back afew times to have supper. The pig stomach soup is very flavourful and not so peppery.
My usual chill out place, will drop by for their 1-1 beer, awesome braised pork rice and some dart time!:)
Came and ordered the bak kut teh and braised meat rice, it's good and worth the price! Nice ambience and service provided. Recommended for friends and families (:

topic: The place is clean and the foods in nice! :)
review: The place is clean and the foods is nice! :) The place is clean and the foods is nice! :) The place is clean and the foods is nice! :)
Very good , nice place to go with family members and friends ! I will definitely will strongly recommend my friends to come and visit this place !

topic: Delicious lunch with boyfriend and fam
review: Definitely a perfect place to go with family. Good and delicious u could find over there. Always good to go back again

topic: Our all time favourite bak my teh for lunch
review: Today we tried their salted egg clams. Delicious. Pork ribs tender n juicy. Strongly recommended. Chicken claws with sweet beans are good too. Restaurant easily found n plenty of parking lots.
The soup is pepper and savoury. Good variety of other dishes. We ordered a lotus soup which was quite good too. Love the taste! Good ambience for family with kids. Fully aircon.
Signature white beehoon is good and yummy. It is very near to bendemeer mrt station. Walking distance if 5 minutes.

topic: 119 lavender street the food here is good and good for those adventurer who is hungry at midnight after playing maplesor
review: Meat here is awesome and the food is very good the service guy was very nice and polite like really.
The taste is very nice and it's good.It is very satisfying and it's the best salted egg clam I ever eaten

We came as many people and ordered many portions of bao kut teh.. soup tasted ok and nice just not hot (temperature) enaugh.. my portion seems small with only 2 bak out where else my friends in have more... 3 or 4 ba kut.. when I asked she said "it's like that". I don't mind but would have expected a better answer.. but overall nice soup..
Friendly service crew.. üëçgood food üòâ.. and nice location üè§.. will definitely come back with friends!!!
nice foods!!! alot of variety... soup are nice too. pig trotter are yummy too. will be back again. :)
It's my first visit to Koon Bak Kut Teh at Lavender.. The staff are friendly and we enjoy our trip here. The soup is tasty and definitely deserve a second visit. Yumms!!!
Nice and yummy soup! Ambience is good! Staff is helpful. Good place to dine in ... Do drop by to check it out ;)
